channel.title: Comments on: Cashew Kidney Bean Chocolate Brownies – Daring Bakers Challenge March 2013

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Fabulous... Great job on your brownies...

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Great job on your brownies, they look great! I made brownies, too, but used black beans. It would be so fun to do a side-by-side comparison to see the differences!
item.content:encoded: Great job on your brownies, they look great! I made brownies, too, but used black beans. It would be so fun to do a side-by-side comparison to see the differences!

item.title: By: Makey-Cakey
item.dc:creator: Makey-Cakey
item.description: Great job - and glad that no-one was able to guess the hidden ingredient! Thanks for taking part this month Rx
item.content:encoded:
Great job – and glad that no-one was able to guess the hidden ingredient!
Thanks for taking part this month
Rx
